document_data.name: Tome of the Faith-Leap Trial
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Tome of the Faith-Leap Trial''''' was a [[book|textbook]] used to teach [[Sharran]] initiates to trust the holy path of darkness that was printed in the ancient times, long before the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''Your tongue may claim to have complete faith in Lady Shar, but does your heart follow suit? Dare you trust your instincts, and navigate her sacred darkness with only your faith to protect you?''|An excerpt from ''Tome of the Faith-Leap Trial''}}
document_data.Content: The purpose of the ''Tome of the Faith-Leap Trial'' was to help young initiates pass the faith-leap trial, which was part of the [[Gauntlet of Shar]] and a right of passage for [[Dark Justiciars]] of the Church. It instructed the acolytes to step into Shar's darkness and be guided by her along a perilous veering path across an invisible bridge. The tome claimed that those whose heart was closed to the Nightsinger were doomed to plummet into the darkness underneath.
